attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Encourage the creation of broad-leaved woodlands from Green Belt and greenfield lands, specifically:

Provide financial encouragement for the conversion of greenfield and Green Belt lands into new woodlands.
Prohibit the building of new housing on Green Belt land.
Prohibit currently wooded areas from ever being cleared (e.g. for farming or housing).
Encourage random and natural-looking tree dispersal on new plantations (not geometric lines of saplings)
Encourage mixed-species plantations
Prohibit non-native tree species from being planted in woodlands
Discourage the clearing of dead and rotting logs (over zealous woodland management), these are essential to the well-being of a wood and it's wildlife.
